humidity.docs:
The information for the humidity sensor
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [DHT Temperature+Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dht.html#configuration-variables)*

model.docs:
**, int**: Manually specify the DHT model, can be one of `AUTO_DETECT`, `DHT11`, `DHT22`, `DHT22_TYPE2`, `AM2302`, `RHT03`, `SI7021`, `AM2120` and helps with some connection issues. Defaults to `AUTO_DETECT`.  Auto detection doesn’t work for the SI7021 chip.

*See also: [DHT Temperature+Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dht.html#configuration-variables)*

pin.docs:
**, [Pin](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin)**: The pin where the DHT bus is connected.

*See also: [DHT Temperature+Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dht.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature.docs:
The information for the temperature sensor.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [DHT Temperature+Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dht.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [DHT Temperature+Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dht.html#configuration-variables)*
